alert.note: Alert for Archer; Clay; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 2:29PM CDT until November 04 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CLAY...EASTERN ARCHER AND SOUTHEASTERN WICHITA COUNTIES... At 229 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Archer City, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita Falls, Archer City, Scotland, Dean, Jolly, Sheppard AFB, Lake Kickapoo, Lakeside City, Pleasant Valley and Cashion. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
